name: no light dungeon crawl
description:
the video with the gameplay demonstration ------->

CONTROLS

arrows to move

esc to quit

return to restart the level if you stuck

HOW TO PLAY

you need to reach the red square until it will be too dark. when level increases the darkness starts to come faster. enemies can kill you. NOBODY can make it to the 6th level! 

this game is made for siberian game jam 2020.
